title: Is NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) Stock Near the Top of the Semiconductors Industry?
text:
NVIDIA Corp (NVDA) leads the Semiconductors industry with an overall score of 80. NVDA is up 242.16% so far this year after the company closed yesterday at $776.63.  The overall score measures the company's performance based-off both short and long term indicators and means that NVDA scores better than 80% of the overall market.





 NVDA has an Overall Score of 80. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on NVDA!
See Full NVDA Report





NVIDIA Corp is a strong performer in the Semiconductors industry, which has an average overall score of 43. This means that, on average, the stocks in this industry score higher than 43% of the stock market.



 To see InvestorsObserver's  Sentiment Score for NVIDIA Corp  click here.

NVDA has been trading neutral recently. The stock is trading up 15.10% this week following yesterday's rise. NVDA has an average analyst ranking of Strong Buy with an average price target of $833.8.
